name: AirGap
description:
AirGap is an iOS Framework that allows Developers to build their applications in a decoupled, domain-centric fashion. Airgap helps large iOS apps, break apart their internal constituents into seperate air-gapped applications that have zero-knowledge of one another, all while maintaing first-class communciation support.

AirGap is the middleware that coordinates the gap and provides a host of tools and features to help large iOS teams decouple their apps, increase their testing ability and surface the app's functionality to the production organization.
